website_summaries.verdict: It's hard to beat the overall quality of this saucepan if you don't mind spending a bit more up front.
pros: Forgiving cooking surface that excels in browning and searing
Stainless steel handles come with a bolster for a more secure grip
cons: A common complaint is that the pan is quite heavy, which isn't surprising given its copper construction

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful cookware
customer_reviews.text: I loved this cookware, but I had to return it "unused". It was absolutely too heavy for me to lift when it was empty so I knew if I tried to use it, I would be unable to handle it when it had contents. Other reviewers said it was heavy but I had no idea just how heavy. I think most women would be unable to use these pans, but for a male chef they would be wonderful. I also loved that it was made in the USA. I am so tired of everything made in China. I also resent many manufacturers saying USA when something was made in another country but assembled or packaged here.
customer_reviews.author: Lake lady

customer_reviews.title: Love this cookware!
customer_reviews.text: We own a set of All-Clad Copper Core cookware but decided this size pan would be handy to add to our collection. Very expensive cookware, but if you do a lot of cooking, it's worth the price. Cooks evenly and cleans up easily. We had Calphalon previously, which we were happy with, but we're amazed at how much better this cookware is. Regarding this pan specifically, it's a good intermediate size. Our set came with 1.5 qt and 4 qt pans, which are often a little small and a little large for cooking for two people.
customer_reviews.author: B. Andalora

customer_reviews.title: Top Notch quality. Even heat.
customer_reviews.text: Please don't write a review about items sticking to this pot. If you are not familiar with how to use stainless pots/pans, buy Teflon or other and move on. Great even heat. We did a boil test(not very scientific, but just for amusement) to see if one side rolled a boil much more than another. Fully expected some unevenness. Not at all. Completely balanced boil. Sturdy construction. Great balance between handle and body. Heavy design. All-Clad is now my "go to." Have not been disappointed with the 3+ products I have purchased.
customer_reviews.author: C. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Awesome cookware.
customer_reviews.text: I recently made the switch to stainless and I'm not going back. Also we recently went induction and these do well on our cooktop.

customer_reviews.title: Just get it...
customer_reviews.text: All-Clad is some of the world's best cookware, made right here in the USA. I have a bunch of their products, and they are one of the few kitchen that simply makes me into a better cook. Construction quality is outstanding - they will likely outlive me. Evenness of heating is amazing...this is why you buy the Copper Core line - much better than the others, easy to clean, works terrific on induction cooktops - really, there isn't a bad thing I can say about this (or any other) All-Clad product. Only possible drawback is that these are heavy pots, so if you're a petite cook, you might find that they give you a workout. Absolutely recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Busy Executive

product_meta.title: All-Clad 6203 SS Copper Core 5-Ply Bonded Dishwasher Safe Saucepan with Lid / Cookware, 3-Quart, Silver
product_meta.description: Size:3-QuartBecause of its shape, this All-Clad COPPER CORE 6203 SS 3-Quart sauce pan pan is ideal for making sauces, heating liquids, cooking food in liquids and reheating. With high, straight sides and a smaller surface area, the sauce pan holds heat well and limits evaporation. The classic sauce pan is a versatile essential found in a variety of sizes in every well- equipped kitchen, and it can be used with or without its lid to control evaporation. Designed for professional use, COPPER CORE features 5-ply construction with a copper center, which transfers heat and spreads it quickly, evenly, and precisely throughout the cookware, all the way to the rim. The super-responsive cookware works well for recipes that require precise temperature control, such as delicate sauces. COPPER CORE's 18/10 stainless-steel interior offers a highly polished cooking surface with a starburst finish for superior stick resistance, easy maintenance, and non-reactivity with food to preserve true flavor. Permanently attached with stainless-steel rivets, the cookware’s stainless-steel handles offer a heat choke to reduce heat transfer, a bolster for added control, and a comfortable contour that caters to a chef’s underhand grip. Made in the USA, All-Clad COPPER CORE cookware offers induction compatibility, flared edges for drip-free pouring, engraved capacity markings, and upscale aesthetics with a copper skive cut away for long-lasting beauty in any kitchen.
